news.title: 特朗普将格陵兰诉求与诺贝尔奖挂钩
news.title0: Trump ties Greenland demands to Nobel Prize in message to Norway leader
news.content: 特朗普致信挪威首相，称因未获诺贝尔和平奖，他不再有义务只考虑和平，并坚持美国需要“完全控制”格陵兰。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has said he no longer feels obliged to think only of peace after he was not awarded the Nobel Peace Prize last year.In a message to Norway's Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Støre, Trump blamed the country for not giving him the prize.In his reply to Trump, Støre explained that an independent committee, not the government of Norway, awards the prize which last October went to Venezuela's opposition leader María Corina Machado.In the same message to Støre, Trump insisted the US needed "Complete and Total Control of Greenland" - the semi autonomous Danish territory. Asked later if he planned to use force to seize it, he replied "no comment".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布鲁克林·贝克汉姆公开与父母决裂
news.title0: I do not want to reconcile with my family, says Brooklyn Peltz Beckham
news.content: 大卫·贝克汉姆长子布鲁克林在社交媒体发长文，指责父母长期破坏其婚姻，并表示“不想与家人和解”。
news.content0: "I do not want to reconcile with my family," Brooklyn Peltz Beckham has said in a statement addressing his strained relationship with his parents.Peltz Beckham, the eldest child of Sir David Beckham and Lady Victoria Beckham, accused his parents of "trying endlessly to ruin"his relationship with Nicola Peltz Beckham, both before and after their wedding in 2022."My wife has been consistently disrespected by my family, no matter how hard we've tried to come together as one," he wrote on Instagram on Monday.Speculation had been circulating for months about a feud within the family. The BBC has reached out to Sir David's and Lady Beckham's representatives for comment.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 俄罗斯幸灾乐祸，称欧洲因格陵兰问题“彻底迷失”
news.title0: 'Europe is at a total loss': Russia gloats over Greenland tensions
news.content: 俄罗斯政府媒体赞扬特朗普并批评反对美国吞并格陵兰的欧洲领导人，称欧洲的困境让莫斯科“乐于观看”。
news.content0: Listen to Donald Trump and you would think Moscow and Beijing were lying in wait off the coast of Greenland, ready to pounce to boost their power in the Arctic.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大女子在澳大利亚海滩遭野狗围尸
news.title0: Canadian woman found dead surrounded by dingoes on Australian beach
news.content: 一名19岁加拿大女游客在澳大利亚昆士兰州海滩被发现死亡，尸体被一群野狗包围，死因尚在调查中。
news.content0: A 19-year-old Canadian woman has been found dead, with her body surrounded by a pack of dingoes on a popular Australian beach, according to local officials.The body of the tourist, whose name has not been released, was found around 06:30 local time on Monday (20:30 GMT on Sunday) on the beach on K'Gari, an island off Australia's eastern coast, Queensland police said in a news release.Two men driving along the beach spotted a pack of about10 dingoes around an object, which they realised was a woman's body, police inspector Paul Algie told local media.Police are investigating the incident, but cannot yet confirm whether she died from drowning or from being attacked by the animals, he said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 意大利传奇时装设计师瓦伦蒂诺逝世
news.title0: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies aged 93
news.content: 意大利著名时装设计师瓦伦蒂诺·加拉瓦尼在罗马家中安详离世，享年93岁，其作品定义了数十年的奢华与优雅。
news.content0: Italian fashion designer Valentino Garavani, known as Valentino, has died at the age of 93.One of the giants of 20th century fashion, Valentino's creations were worn by celebrities and well-known figures including Elizabeth Taylor, Nancy Reagan, Sharon Stone, Julia Roberts and Gwyneth Paltrow.He co-founded the Valentino fashion house in 1960 and ranked alongside Giorgio Armani and Karl Lagerfeld at the top of the profession.In a statement posted on Instagram the Valentino Garavani and Giancarlo Giammetti Foundation said: "He passed away peacefully in his Roman home, surrounded by the love of his family."
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国海滩被泄漏薯条和洋葱覆盖
news.title0: Chips ahoy! English beach covered in French fries and onions after cargo ship spill
news.content: 英国东萨塞克斯郡海滩因货船集装箱坠海，被大量未烹煮的薯条和洋葱覆盖，清理工作正在进行。
news.content0: A beach inEnglandhas disappeared under a blanket of uncooked French fries and onions after a container ship spilled its cargo earlier this month.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 日本首相高市早苗宣布解散众议院
news.title0: Japan prime minister Takaichi to dissolve parliament Friday and call national election
news.content: 日本首相高市早苗宣布将于周五解散众议院并举行大选，同时承诺暂停征收8%食品消费税两年。
news.content0: Japanese Prime Minister ‌Sanae Takaichion Monday called ⁠a snap general election with a vow to suspend an ‍8% food levy for two years, echoing proposals by her rivals despite the potential ‌strain onthe country’salready precarious finances.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 欧盟与南美南方共同市场签署自贸协定
news.title0: EU and South America’s Mercosur bloc sign landmark free trade agreement
news.content: 欧盟与南美南方共同市场正式签署具有里程碑意义的自由贸易协定，结束了长达二十多年的谈判。
news.content0: The European Union and the Mercosur bloc of South American countries formally signed a long-sought landmarkfree trade agreementon Saturday, capping more than a quarter-century of torturous negotiations to strengthen commercial ties in the face of rising protectionism and trade tensions around the world.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 爱尔兰教师因跨性别学生争议再度入狱
news.title0: Teacher in transgender student row sent back to jail in Ireland
news.content: 爱尔兰一名福音派基督教教师因拒绝使用跨性别学生的新代词被解雇，现因再次违反禁止其进入学校的法庭命令而被送回监狱。
news.content0: An Evangelical Christian teacher, involved in a row over how to address a transgender student, has been sent back to prison after again breaching a court order which banned him from trespassing on the school premises.
news.author: Sky News
